TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimsAuthenticationManager extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定义身份验证管理器的基本实现。

span.span: Defines the base implementation for a claims authentication manager.

summary.span: 声明验证管理器在声明处理管道中提供某一位置以便将处理逻辑（筛选、验证、扩展）在执行到达您的应用程序代码之前应用于传入主体的声明集合。

span.span: The claims authentication manager provides a place in the claims processing pipeline for applying processing logic (filtering, validation, extension) to the claims collection in the incoming principal before execution reaches your application code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证管理器提供了在应用程序的一个扩展点声明处理管道，它可用于验证、 筛选、 修改的声明，传入声明，或将新的声明注入到提供的声明集RP 之前执行应用程序代码。The claims authentication manager provides an extensibility point in the application’s claims processing pipeline that you can use to validate, filter, modify, incoming claims or inject new claims into the set of claims presented by a before the RP application code is executed. 你甚至可以返回的自定义实现如果 RP 应用程序需要它。You can even return a custom implementation of if your RP application requires it. 提供的默认实现类返回中的声明未修改的形式; 但是，您可以从此类派生并重写方法来修改中的声明（或返回一个自定义).The default implementation provided by the class returns the claims in the unmodified; however, you can derive from this class and override the method to modify the claims in the (or to return a custom ). 创建自定义声明身份验证管理器的典型原因是要添加、 删除或转换声明基于仅通过已知或更好地，这样一来，维持信赖方应用程序的信息。A typical reason for creating a custom claims authentication manager is to add, remove, or transform claims based on information that is only known by or is, perhaps, better maintained by the RP application. 例如，在购物车应用程序中的客户购买情况的历史记录可能保留在数据库维护的信赖方应用程序，然后添加到返回的声明身份验证管理器根据名称声明中找到的值的声明主体传入主体。For example, a history of customer purchases in a shopping cart application might be kept in a data base maintained by the RP application and then added to the claims principal returned by the claims authentication manager based on the value of a name claim found in the incoming principal. 可以配置应用程序以使用`ClaimsAuthenticationManager`以编程方式通过使用类或在配置中通过[ <claimsAuthenticationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md)元素 (这是子元素的[ <identityConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)元素)。You can configure your application to use a `ClaimsAuthenticationManager` either programmatically by using the class or in configuration through the [<claimsAuthenticationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md) element (which is a child element of the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element). 您可以重写方法以提供的自定义的子元素的处理``元素可以通过其配置自定义管理器。You can override the method to provide processing for custom child elements of the `` element through which your custom manager can be configured. 基实现不处理任何子元素。The base implementation of does not handle any child elements. 配置应用程序以使用声明身份验证管理器可确保，它将调用 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 从请求管道。Configuring your application to use a claims authentication manager ensures that it will be invoked by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) from the request pipeline. ## Examples 下面的代码演示简单的声明身份验证添加到传入主体的角色声明，而不执行任何检查传入声明上的管理器...The following code shows a simple claims authentication manager that adds a role claim to the incoming principal without performing any check on the incoming claims.. [!code-csharp[WifWebApplication1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwebapplication1/cs/myclaimsauthenticationmanager/simpleclaimsauthenticatonmanager.cs#1)] 下面的 XML 演示``元素。The following XML shows the `` element. ```xml ... ```

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal Authenticate (string resourceName, System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal incomingPrincipal);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal Authenticate(string resourceName, class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal incomingPrincipal) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Authenticate (resourceName As String, incomingPrincipal As ClaimsPrincipal) As ClaimsPrincipal
public: virtual System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ resourceName, System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ incomingPrincipal);

abstract member Authenticate : string * System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal -> System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal override this.Authenticate : string * System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal -> System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal

span.span: The address of the resource that is being requested.

param.name: incomingPrincipal
param.span: 表示正在尝试访问资源的经过身份验证的用户的声明主体。

span.span: The claims principal that represents the authenticated user that is attempting to access the resource.

summary.span: 在派生中重写时，将返回与 RP 应用程序的要求一致的 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a object consistent with the requirements of the RP application.

summary.span: 默认实现未修改传入的 。

span.span: The default implementation does not modify the incoming .

returns.span: 包含 RP 应用程序所需任何修改的声明主体。

span.span: A claims principal that contains any modifications necessary for the RP application.

returns.span: 默认实现返回未被修改的传入声明主体。

span.span: The default implementation returns the incoming claims principal unmodified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法可以重写此方法在派生类进行筛选的请求处理管道，从修改，或将声明注入到根据你的信赖方应用程序的策略的声明主体。The method is called from the request processing pipeline You can override this method in a derived class to filter, modify, or inject claims into the claims principal according to the policy of your RP application. 具体取决于信赖方应用程序的要求，甚至可以返回的自定义实现。Depending on the requirements of the RP application, you can even return a custom implementation of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodelist) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (nodelist As XmlNodeList)
abstract member LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit override this.LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit

param.name: nodelist
param.span: 列表中的每个节点都属于 类型。

span.span: Each node in the list is of type .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将从 XML 中加载自定义配置。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置基础结构调用方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 调用此方法时，`nodelist`将包含的顶级子元素[ <claimsAuthenticationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md)配置文件中的元素。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<claimsAuthenticationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthenticationmanager.md) element from the configuration file. 每个元素可能反过来，还包含属性或子元素，具体取决于为您派生的类定义的配置架构。Each of these elements may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 如果没有子元素出现在``配置文件中的元素，不调用此方法。If no child elements appear under the `` element in the configuration file, this method is not called. 默认实现会引发。The default implementation throws a . 重写此方法以启用对配置文件中声明身份验证管理器的初始化派生类中。Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your claims authentication manager from a configuration file. 例如，配置元素可能描述了用于进行身份验证的声明主体; 时遵循的策略或者它们可能用于点到是要添加到主体其他声明的属性存储。For example, the configuration elements might describe a policy to be followed when authenticating a claims principal; or they might be used to point to an attribute store from which additional claims are to be added to the principal.
